newsitems.title: Baldur's Gate 3 Arcane Tower guide: how to unlock the elevator and find Omeelum's mushrooms
newsitems.author: Ted Litchfield
newsitems.contents: s you explore the Underdark in Baldur's Gate 3, you'll eventually encounter the friendly Mind Flayer Omeluum at the Myconid Colony. He gives the quest Tell Omeluum About the Parasite which feeds into the Remove the Parasite main quest. He'll request that you collect two dangerous mushrooms from a nearby Arcane Tower in order to help him research your tadpole... Read more.

newsitems.title: Baldur's Gate 3 save issues, crashes, bugs, and more addressed in first hotfix
newsitems.contents: Larian Studios has released the first hotfix for Baldur's Gate 3, and it addresses some save issues that were plaguing players. Players were running into issues when loading an old save game while at Last Light, and they could get stuck in a loading screen when loading a save game after dying. To address this, the studio has disabled Larian Account cross-saves temporarily to solve the issue of blocking loads and saves. Steam cross-saves are unaffected. Read more

newsitems.title: You need to turn on this hidden Baldur's Gate 3 feature right now
newsitems.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
newsitems.contents: Baldur's Gate 3 is here, and the incredibly intricate and deep Larian RPG game can be difficult to parse at the best of times, so it's vital to be prepared. While our Baldur's Gate 3 review is certainly worth a read, you'll also want to be caught up on Baldur's Gate 3 reactions too, as the feature is a little hidden, but an absolute game changer if you enable it properly. Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: Baldur's Gate 3 mod lets you play the whole game as a skeleton Is Baldur's Gate 3 Steam Deck compatible? Baldur's Gate 3 so popular it's crashing everything, forums included

newsitems.title: The best thing Baldur's Gate 3 has added to D&D is underpants lore
newsitems.author: Jody Macgregor
newsitems.contents: The way we've been talking about the companions in Baldur's Gate 3 is "like seven-year-old girls describing their dolls," my editor-in-chief says, making sure to add that he means it in a good way and this is "a strong sign that the game is good." That's ridiculous, I reply, while taking off all their clothes to look at their underpants... Read more.

newsitems.title: Baldur's Gate 3 so popular it's crashing everything, forums included
newsitems.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
newsitems.contents: Baldur's Gate 3 is my favorite RPG game this year and with good reason. Larian Studios has been hard at work improving the gameplay and much more in Baldur's Gate 3 while preparing for its recent launch out of early access. Not only did the highly anticipated game exceed the developers' expectations, but it surpassed just about every milestone you could imagine. Due to its massive popularity and the sheer influx of new players, Baldur's Gate 3 has managed to crash multiple online platforms including the likes of Steam and Larian Studios' own forums. Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: Baldur's Gate 3 mod lets you play the whole game as a skeleton You need to turn on this hidden Baldur's Gate 3 feature right now Is Baldur's Gate 3 Steam Deck compatible?

newsitems.title: How Baldur's Gate 3's stealth and sneak work
newsitems.author: Tyler Colp
newsitems.contents: Stealth in Baldur's Gate 3 works like you'd expect if you've snuck around in other games, but a number of things can reveal you if you're not careful. A keen understanding of the RPG's stealth mechanics, stats, and stealth checks will make slipping into the shadows much easier... Read more.

newsitems.title: You can get a 'happy' ending in the first minutes of Baldur's Gate 3, sort of
newsitems.author: Tyler Wilde
newsitems.contents: I love a game that allows us to defy the expectations games put on us. In Far Cry 5, for example, you can wait around doing nothing at the start of the game to avoid all of the other events in the game, rolling credits without making a move. And in Baldur's Gate 3, you can make a choice very near the start that ends the adventure before it's really begun—and your character is completely happy about it... Read more.

newsitems.title: Of course Baldur's Gate 3 lets you stack dozens of crates and stand on top of them so you can teleport over the wall of a keep
newsitems.author: Tyler Wilde
newsitems.contents: During a Steam broadcast that I can't for the life of me find an archived copy of, Larian Studios founder Swen Vincke and famous dungeon master Matt Mercer demonstrated that, yep, Baldur's Gate 3 is a Larian RPG... Read more.

newsitems.title: Be very, very careful with this early Act 2 quest in Baldur's Gate 3
newsitems.author: Morgan Park
newsitems.contents: Note: Spoilers for the beginning of Baldur's Gate 3 Act 2 below... Read more.

newsitems.title: Baldur's Gate 3 update fixes launch bugs and changes cinematics
newsitems.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
newsitems.contents: Baldur's Gate 3 has already taken the gaming community by storm, even though the RPG game has been out for just a day. Following Larian Studios' ground-breaking release of Baldur's Gate 3, fans of Dungeons & Dragons from all around the globe began their adventures, fighting through mind flayers, goblins, and hyenas alike. Despite its very recent launch, the developers have been on top of player reports and have just dropped the first Baldur's Gate 3 update which acts as a hotfix for many reported issues and improves upon in-game features. Read the rest of the story...
